    • isHasDeployed

      public boolean isHasDeployed()
      Reduces the reinforcements. Checks if the player has already deployed the reinforcements.
      Returns:
      True if the player has deployed the reinforcements.

    • setHasDeployed

      public void setHasDeployed(boolean p_hasDeployed)
      Sets the value indicating that if the player has deployed the reinforcements.
      Parameters:
      p_hasDeployed - Value of true if the player has deployed the reinforcements.

    • canPlayerReinforce

      public boolean canPlayerReinforce(int p_usedReinforcementCount)
      Generates the number of balance reinforcements for the player.

      Shows error if the player orders more than allowed reinforcements than in possession. This method also sets the remaining number of reinforcements left for the future use.

      Parameters:
      p_usedReinforcementCount - Total number of used reinforcements.
      Returns:
      True if the player can reinforce the armies else false.

    • issueOrder

      public void issueOrder() throws ReinforcementOutOfBoundException, InvalidCommandException, EntityNotFoundException, ExecutionException, InterruptedException, InvalidArgumentException
      Gets order from the user and stores the order for the player.
      Throws:
      ReinforcementOutOfBoundException - If the player doesn't have enough reinforcement to issue the order.
      InvalidCommandException - If there is an error while preprocessing the user command.
      InvalidArgumentException - If the mentioned value is not of expected type.
      EntityNotFoundException - If the target country not found.
      ExecutionException - If any error while processing concurrent thread.
      InterruptedException - If scheduled thread was interrupted.

    • addExecutedOrder

      public void addExecutedOrder(Order p_executedOrder)
      Adds the order to the list of player's executed orders.
      Parameters:
      p_executedOrder - Executed order to be added.

    • getExecutedOrders

      public List<Order> getExecutedOrders()
      Gets the list of executed orders.
      Returns:
      Value of the list of orders.

    • hasOrders

      public boolean hasOrders()
      Checks if the player has any order for execution.
      Returns:
      Value of true if the player has one or more orders.

    • nextOrder

      public Order nextOrder() throws OrderOutOfBoundException
      Gets the first order from the order list and removes the order from the list before returning it.
      Returns:
      Value of order to be executed.
      Throws:
      OrderOutOfBoundException - If the player does not have any order.
